name: Rice Salad with Tuna
author: dustysun
summary: You can serve it in small bowls or on salad greens, garnish it with tomato wedges and cooked egg slices. This easy and delicious salad is great for lunch or afternoon snack. It makes also a great party dish.
ingredients: 1 (5 ounce) can light tuna in water, drained
1 (8 ounce) can whole kernel corn, drained
½ cup creamy salad dressing (such as Miracle Whip®)
directions: Bring the rice and water to a boil in a saucepan over high heat
Reduce heat to medium-low, cover, and simmer until the rice is tender and the liquid has been absorbed, 20 to 25 minutes
Stir the rice, tuna, corn, sweet pickle relish, and salad dressing in a large bowl to combine
Refrigerate for at least 1 hour before serving
